敘利亞文.definition: Syriac language (from c. 2nd century BC); the Syriac script

敘功行賞.definition: to review records and decide on rewards (idiom)

敘拉古.definition: Syracuse, Sicily; also written 錫拉庫薩|锡拉库萨[Xi1 la1 ku4 sa4]

敘永.definition: Xuyong county in Luzhou 瀘州|泸州[Lu2 zhou1], Sichuan

敘永縣.definition: Xuyong county in Luzhou 瀘州|泸州[Lu2 zhou1], Sichuan

敘舊.definition: to reminisce; to talk about former times

敘述.definition: to relate (a story or information); to tell or talk about; to recount; narration; telling; narrative; account
